mapper.insert: insert into cleaningrequest(uid, nick, building_classification, house_size, wish_date, wish_local1, wish_local2, hope_matters) values(#{uid}, #{nick}, #{building_classification}, #{house_size}, #{wish_date}, #{wish_local1}, #{wish_local2}, #{hope_matters})
mapper.select: select * from cleaningrequest where isDelete=0 order by crno desc
select * from cleaningrequest where uid=#{uid} and isDelete=0
select count(*) from cleaningrequest where uid=#{uid} and isDelete = 0;
mapper.update: update cleaningrequest set isDelete = 1 where crno=#{crno};
